title: Logistic
description: Participated in backend development project for Japanese logistics client
longDescription: The Logistic Platform project is a large system consisting of multiple components (Frontend, Backend, Cloud, etc.). Collaborated with the Japanese team to handle backend processing.
features: Process data by batch for parts:
challenges: Optimize performance with large data volumes
The system is very large but the corresponding part is only a small part, so we need to consider the level of impact
The system uses a self-built Framework, so understanding the Framework requires a long time
The system includes many teams working simultaneously, so deadlines are quite strict.
solutions: Add performance check steps to identify bottlenecks, then improve performance.
During the work process, we must always communicate with people in the team and communicate with parties to limit the level of impact.
